content: I wound up rebasing it anyways before pulling it in because I had to do arcane sorcery in order to fix some things, lolsob.
I should probably have actually subjected that to review, but the gist of it is this: we now define simd_swizzle as a decl_macro, AKA "macros 2.0". This means it follows normal item path rules.
This does not add another feature to library/core/src/lib.rs because these are already in use in std.
Its actual contents change essentially not at all, as it uses a basically identical syntax.
Jubilee has marked this topic as resolved.
